document.full_text: somali pirates freed a panama-flagged chemical tanker and its mostly tunisian crew on thursday after payment of a ransom, pirates and the tunisian tap news agency said.
document.title: pirates free panamanian tanker, seize bulk carrier
lines_and_colors: somali pirates freed a panama-flagged chemical tanker and its mostly tunisian crew on thursday after payment of a ransom, pirates and the tunisian tap news agency said.
